description:
The Gardening Club prepares for an incoming typhoon. Despite not having school that day, you and Akira both decide to come to school, and end up having to spend time in the club room until the typhoon passes. As the storm gets stronger, you and Akira get closer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kotokawa Akira Is Worried About It
Kotokawa Akira wa Ki ni Shiteru
